website_summaries.verdict: This compact and simple transfer pump has a long hose for filling diesel.
pros: 13-foot hose, which can be cut for length adjustments
Makes filling tanks with high inlet easy
cons: Some users did not find the set-up easy, and had to adjust parts
Can only be used for diesel fuel

customer_reviews.title: Great pump but fuel filter wouldn't fit a 5 gallon can
customer_reviews.text: I think this pump is going to work great for pumping diesel fuel from a 5 gallon plastic fuel can to my tractor. However, I do want to mention that the fuel filter WILL NOT FIT in a 5 gallon Briggs and Stratton diesel fuel can. I think I read on a review that it will fit a 5 gallon can - but, again, not in a Briggs and Stratton. I am going to have to find a smaller filter to fit on the intake fuel line. Otherwise, the pump and assembly seem well made and should work well. I plan to get a small 12V lawn tractor battery to use with the pump.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: but it does a fine job. It seems as fast as my much ...
customer_reviews.text: I'll admit I wasn't expecting much from this pump, but it does a fine job. It seems as fast as my much more expensive truck mounted high flow pump, but I can't verify because I don't have a flow meter on it. We use this to pump diesel fuel out of a storage tank on the job site. What I like about it is the portability and the ease of setup. You could easily switch from one tank to another without having to unscrew pipes and all of that.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan guy

customer_reviews.title: works great.made refueling easy
customer_reviews.text: bought this a couple months ago to refuel Mahindra emax.really impressed with tractor except for couple of small things,one being you have to stuggle holding 5 gallon can above hood to refuel.not easy thing to do for anyone but even harder if you're a little on on the old side with messed up shoulders.this pump was a great solution to this problem.used about 10 times but so far works great.hope it &me keeps going strong for many years.thanks for what seems to be a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mole

customer_reviews.title: Easy diesel transfer!
customer_reviews.text: Love the ease of use and portability of this little pump. No suction hose included but that was an easy fix. The speed and ease of transferring diesel to my tractor was amazing. I use to have to lift a five gallon container of diesel over my head to fill the tractor and make several trips. Now I take a 10 gallon drum fill that and then transfer to the tractor. Makes fueling the tractor almost enjoyable. Great value, quick shipping, quality product!
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: The pump is great! The hose is cheap and the nozzle leaked
customer_reviews.text: The pump is great! The hose is cheap and the nozzle leaked. Replaced those 2 items and its perfect
customer_reviews.author: Clyde Waller

customer_reviews.title: A complete kit will certainly move your hydrocarbons
customer_reviews.text: Great product, has completely done the job for me. Will fill a 5 gallon can in about 40 seconds. Needs to be permanently mounted and bonded. A rather complete kit.
customer_reviews.author: FIllC

customer_reviews.title: love it, my uncle use it everyday since he ...
customer_reviews.text: love it, my uncle use it everyday since he still doesn't have power at his house after the huricanne and still using a generator everyday.. more than 100 days after the huricanne
customer_reviews.author: Yaixa L. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: It would be nice if the supplied hose is about 5' longer (so ...
customer_reviews.text: Took a little effort to put the pump and hoses together. The transfer hose was just long enough to use as is in it entire length as the outlet hose for filling tractor and vehicle. Had to spend much time looking around chasing down local hardware stores for another length (~5') of hose for the take-up side. It would be nice if the supplied hose is about 5' longer (so it can be cut and used as the take-up hose).
customer_reviews.author: Baodakao

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Tried to save a few bucks, mistake. Not worth the savings. It consistently blows fuses, battery cables are ridiculously short, and nozzle leaks. Just step up and pay for a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Raymo

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic pump for the farm
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic pump for the farm. Mounted on the roll cage of my Ranger. I mounted an anderson 45 amp plug on the power cord and threw away the spring clips. Permenant fuel pump and jump start capability anywhere on the property. It's a quality set up.
customer_reviews.author: Maxify55

customer_reviews.title: I bought this pump to use with a 55g drum ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pump to use with a 55g drum, about half way of pumping in drum pump stop pumping. Will not empty drum.
customer_reviews.author: stephenjackson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Does not work as intended. Blows fuse and pumps very slowly.
customer_reviews.author: Marie A.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly ,it’s portable👍🏻👍🏻And you don’t have to permanently mount it on the tank -now you can put a cover on your truck
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: It works and seems solid.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty good! I pump 100 gallons of fuel in minutes. The nozzle doesn’t leak on mine but the hose it comes with is short so I bought another piece and use the new one for the output side and the one it came with for the suction side. I also spliced in a longer power cord. It works though and it wasn’t $200
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Pump For The Money
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. Pumps faster than I expected. Have it plumbed to a 200 gallon cage. Throw it in the truck with the forks, fill it then unload it. So much nicer than 5 gallon jerry cans. The government is within a hairs breadth of making it impossible to extract the contents of a fuel container. When it is perfected their work will be done.
customer_reviews.author: Lemo

customer_reviews.title: The pump works great, is easy to assemble and did not make ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pump to remove older fuel from a boat tank. The pump works great, is easy to assemble and did not make a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Jens M.

customer_reviews.title: great one
customer_reviews.text: I like the telescoping suction pipe come with the pump, easy to adjust to fit the size of the different barrel. The pump works very great, can feel the high flow rate.
customer_reviews.author: AMZTWNO1

customer_reviews.title: It's quick and easy!
customer_reviews.text: This works great. Only wish the strainer was smaller in diameter so that it fits into a standard 5 gallon can. It sure does make filling the tractor a lot easier than those accordion syphon ditties.
customer_reviews.author: Termite

customer_reviews.title: Good pump
customer_reviews.text: Bought to fill skid steers from a 25 gallon gas n' go "gravity tank". Using the gravity feed system took about 30 min to empty completely. This pump emptys it in a few min. I just connected hose from gas n' go tank to inlet on pump. So far so good, been using in single digits in Illinois and it had been working good. Not sure how it would do with more regular use, but for my application it was exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: jbr23

customer_reviews.title: Better than a fuel can
customer_reviews.text: A little slow but way better than lugging a fuel can
customer_reviews.author: Chance Pittman

customer_reviews.title: The gun nozzle does not like cold weather
customer_reviews.text: It seems to still pump fine but its falling apart. Handle fell off almost immediately and gun nozzle stopped working within 2 weeks. It jammed up and dosen't stop flow at all now. 10 minutes outside and the hose stiffens up almost solid and unbendable . The only thing decent is the pump itself
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had problems getting it to prime but got it working with some additional parts.
customer_reviews.text: I initially gave this a 1 star because It would not self-prime. We found out that the hose curled in the tank and was sucking air. We purchased a steel pipe to drop in the tank instead of the hose that comes with the pump and it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: C. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Surprised me how powerful it is!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for years and pumped fuel oil out of tanks that are in basements and on ground tanks. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Robert darr

customer_reviews.title: Good unit
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I use it to fuel three tractors in the hay field. Hose is the only part that I have replaced. Kinks up
customer_reviews.author: chuck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great and pumps out a 5 gallon can in 1 minute into my boat but the nozzle leaks and the filter does not in a 5 gallon can yes I would buy it again an recommend it .
customer_reviews.author: J. Bovill

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Purchase
customer_reviews.text: We needed this diesel fuel transfer to keep our 150 gal diesel generator full at all times during hurricane season, as we live in PR. It works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Marisela

customer_reviews.title: Fuelworks Electric Diesel Fuel Transfer Pump
customer_reviews.text: This diesel fuel transfer pump does just what its advertised to do. It pumps diesel very quickly and and without a lot of noise.
customer_reviews.author: Randy225

customer_reviews.title: Have spare fuses and an allen wrench to clear jam up from large particles.
customer_reviews.text: I have use this little pump to pump everything it's like the Energizer Bunny
customer_reviews.author: Electric Worx

customer_reviews.title: solid product
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! pump actually metered to about 14GPM wide open. sturdy setup very satisfied thus far will report back if theres an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Connor Griffoul

customer_reviews.title: pump
customer_reviews.text: The hose needs to be a few feet longer for me. Worked great
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy442

customer_reviews.title: Great pump
customer_reviews.text: Nice compact size for a pump that pumps really quickly. Enough hose is included to make a decent pickup hose and a delivery hose, but if you want a long delivery hose, use the included for that and pick up some 3/4" hose (vinyl works good) for the pickup hose. All needed fittings are included.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Works Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good. Self primes quickly. Needs some way to secure suction hose to keep it in correct position in source container.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Eshleman

customer_reviews.title: Great fuel pump.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, can't believe how fast it pumped my 15 gallon boat tank.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should.
customer_reviews.text: First pump show up and didn’t work. Took about 3 weeks or so to get a replacement, but the new one works great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. My opinion
customer_reviews.text: Very fast delivery. Nice product. My opinion, you will need two hoses; don’t cut the hose that is included, buy a short hose that go inside the tank or barrel to suction the fuel.
customer_reviews.author: L Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised on my 2017 F350. With a 90 gal auxiliary tank and 45 on the truck I have excellent range.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Use to pump diesel out of transfer tanks. Pumps a good 8gpm and doesn’t leak a drop. CANT beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn melgard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice pump and works great! Good quality for our fuel tank transfer process.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Hose is a little stiff
customer_reviews.text: Works great, pumped out my heating oil tank, 70 gal was quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: and better than doing it by hand crank
customer_reviews.text: Very fast, and better than doing it by hand crank.
customer_reviews.author: James Stiefel

customer_reviews.title: Great Product quality
customer_reviews.text: Was impressed with quality of everything in box and used yesterday for first time stealing my own fuel out of Peterbilt to Motorhome for less than CA prices worked fantastic Great product !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Pump was easy to install and works well at the moment. Satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Monday

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works just as advertised. Picked up a siphon hose from Tractor Supply and I was in business. I will update later as I use it to see how well it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy not with the trouble
customer_reviews.text: Used one time to fill my tractor would not work again
customer_reviews.author: Dwight

customer_reviews.title: Great pump!!
customer_reviews.text: Great pump. Made it easy to transfer 100+ gallons of heating oil from one buried tank to another. Used riding mower to power.
customer_reviews.author: R.W.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PUMP KIT FOR THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: GREAT PUMP KIT FOR THE PRICE, BUT IT SEEMS A LITTLE LOUD FOR THE PUMP. HAD READ SOME OTHER REVIEWS STATED A GOOD QUIETE PUMP BUT NOT TO ME.. IS THIS PUMP DEFECTIVE??
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: We recommend it if you need one
customer_reviews.text: Beats hand pumping! This one works very well. Price is right too. We recommend it if you need one.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Carrara

customer_reviews.title: Great Value. Pump works well.
customer_reviews.text: The product quit the first time I used it. I attempted to contact the number provided and did not receive a call back. This issue has been resolved. The new pump sent works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Nicol

customer_reviews.title: Will like it to pump faster
customer_reviews.text: Works great!!easy to use!!just a little slow but it gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Try Anything

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The transfer pump worked great. The pump can really flow. Lowered my rating because of the short power wiring.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs better customer support.
customer_reviews.text: The switch was inoperable, I was on a time schedule and had to replace myself.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Beckett

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pump in January for transferring diesel fuel but I didn't set it up and use it until April. I was very happy to find a pump at such a reasonable price which was working nicely. It was only used a few times to transfer a total of about 65 gallons of fuel. As I was using it recently I noticed a puddle of clear oil under the pump and after looking closer realized it is the oil that is supposed to be sealed in the motor housing. In other words- the pump is shot. Amazon only offers a 30 day return policy on the item so I am stuck with a broken $100 pump. Ouch.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Legrande

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for fueling my tractor
customer_reviews.text: Use to have to fuel the tractor 5 gallons at a time Now we fuel the equipment easily.
customer_reviews.author: Don haven

customer_reviews.title: WORKED FINE FOR THREE 5 GALLON CANS OF DIESEL
customer_reviews.text: WORKED FINE FOR THREE 5 GALLON CANS OF DIESEL, THEN WOULD NOT PRIME. IF MANUF WILL REPLACE OR FIX I WILL RATE AGAIN. IT IS USED AT A HOUSEBOAT AND WITH A 30 DAY WINDOW TO RETURN TO AMAZON, I FOUND OUT ABOUT PROBLEM TOO LATE TO RETURN TO AMAZON. UPDATE: GREAT CIRCLE WHO SOLD THE PUMP REPLACED IT AS SOON AS THEY FOUND OUT ABOUT PROBLEM AND THE SECOND PUMP WORKS FINE. I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS PUMP AND I AM VERY PLEASED WITH THE RESPONSE BY GREAT CIRCLE
customer_reviews.author: JUST ONE PERSON

customer_reviews.title: It can be used with gasoline.
customer_reviews.text: 14 April 2017 It is OK. Although its product details state that for safety reason it is not meant for gasoline, it has caused no problem during gasoline transfer. I've used it twice so far with gasoline without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Stuart Otto

customer_reviews.title: would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This small pump drained 20 gallons out of my Boston Whaler fuel tank in just a few minutes with NO priming and at least a three foot rise. Quiet and smooth operation. Impressive for the cost , would highly recommend .
customer_reviews.author: John Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wont find it any cheaper any where. Product is actually well made for the money.
customer_reviews.author: John Brown

customer_reviews.title: See Attached
customer_reviews.text: I am a security contractor currently out of the country. Staff advised the item arrived in good order and prior to promised delivery date. Quality and operation of product will be tested when I return. Rossi
customer_reviews.author: H. J. Rossi

customer_reviews.title: Works very well for $. The hose is not ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for $. The hose is not very desirable, I used it solely to plumb the input to my tank and bought two 20 foot hoses for my output. I am using on an 18 wheeler , hooked it to passenger side tank to fill equipment on site.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Swicegood

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping, looks heavy duty. Works perfect. Will buy from company again.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Y.

customer_reviews.title: I WOULD LOVE IT BUT IT LEAKS AT THE NOZZLE BUT I ...
customer_reviews.text: I WOULD LOVE IT BUT IT LEAKS AT THE NOZZLE BUT I THINK IT NEEDS TO BE TIGHTENED, I TRYED ONCE BUT IT SEEMED TO BE TIGHT ENOUGH, ONLY USED IT ONCE AND BEFORE I USE IT AGAIN I WILL TRY TO TIGHTEN IT AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pump kit
customer_reviews.text: Very nice kit. Pumps like crazy! Very portable and adaptable.
customer_reviews.author: Damon A. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pump,
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pump. I use it to fill my tractor from a 25gal diesel tank. Well made and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Customer again?

customer_reviews.title: but at first glance the quality looks great. Have to get some other parts
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this yet, but at first glance the quality looks great. Have to get some other parts. Will report more later
customer_reviews.author: Michael J

product_meta.title: FUELWORKS Electric Diesel Fuel Transfer Pump Kit, 12 Volts & 10 GPM; NOT For Gasoline
product_meta.description: This 12 volts/10 GPM fuel transfer pump Kit. is designed specifically for Diesel Fuel usage only. Do NOT use with Gasoline.
